column5: Here is a few Vidoes I took yesterday on the ATV on the Lower Grand River ...as allways use caution anywere you Ice Fish ....still no rain here yet as of Sunday at 10.15am but they are calling for heavy rain this afternoon ... tuesday wednesday its going to get really cold so it should be all good weather till the Walleye Tourney Feb 13th ...if you need more info on ice conditions feel free to give me a call before heading out ....  Clip #1      Clip # 2      Clip #3
wow that kind of ice scares me..we live in Brantford on the grand..No ice to be seen here at all.Is that in dunville where you are? Raining here as we speak...
With the rain we have pulled our huts from the river... we will post when the ice is safe again...
